signup-sentence: If don't have an account, create your own.
signin-sentence: If you already have an account,
You have to approve your account from Ad: You have to take the approve from the admin of this website
provide unique name: The name already exists, enter another name
provide unique username: The username already exists, enter another username
password-length: The password should be greater than or equals to 8 characters
confirm-password-length: The confirm password should be greater than or equals to 8 characters
unequal-passwords: The password and confirm password don't match.
thank-message: Thank you for joining our family. Pharma link's family
approve-message: Will send you a confirm message on your mobile
delete-account-question: If delete an account, the owner of that account will not be able to use the program, Would you like to continue the operation?
approve-account-question: If approve an account, the owner of that account will be able to use the program, Would you like to continue the operation?
undo-delete-account-question: If undo the delete operation, and approve the account, the owner of the account will be able to use the program, Would you like to continue the operation?
disapprove-account-question: If dis-approve the account, the owner of the account will not be able to use the program, Would you like to continue the operation?
no-partners-found-message: NO partner found with this search's condition
